summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4250 for the improvement of North 85th Street, from Greenwood Avenue to Woodland Park Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 50534, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
